label.Start:
Hello! In this bot, you can share photos or videos of things that can make people happier!

Commands:
/start - Greetings
/share - Share photo or video
/help - Help

Link to the channel: https://t.me/MentalHealthPlusPlus
label.Help:
1. Enter /share
2. Choose anonymously or not
3. Send a photo or video
4. Wait for the appearance of content in the channel
 Link to the channel: https://t.me/MentalHealthPlusPlus
label.NowYouCanSendPhotosOrVideos: Now you can send photos or videos
label.DoYouWantToStayAnonymous: Do you want to stay anonymous?
